attributes.action: To evoke article 50 on the ORDERS of the 52% of the UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.additional_details:
The Vote on June 23rd was a MAJORITY vote of the UNITED KINGDOM with a resounding order to leave the E.U. now November 3rd the courts have ruled that Parliament has the right to decide on when article 50 is triggered not the Majority of the UK;
Labour, Liberal democrat and others will use this ruling to ENSURE that that BREXIT NEVER happens and THUS disobey the orders of the MAJORITY of the UK this cannot happen!
attributes.background: The Vote on June 23rd was a MAJORITY vote of the UNITED KINGDOM with a resounding order to leave the E.U. now November 3rd the courts have ruled that Parliament has the right to decide on when article 50 is triggered not the Majority of the UK; and this ruling WILL be used to stop BREXIT!
